SEARCH
Package neuralnetwork

Class Architecture

java.lang.Object
neuralnetwork.Architecture
public class Architecture extends Object
Describes the number of nodes in each layer and the number of weights. Provides transformations from an index in a vector describing a neural network to a weight or bias index defined by layer number, row, and height, and vice versa. each node has.

  • Constructor Details

    • Architecture

      public Architecture(ActivationFunction af, int dataDim, int... numNodesPerLayer)
      The constructor.
      Parameters:
      af - The activation function for this architecture.
      dataDim - The dimension / size of each data vector that will be fed into the neural network.
      numNodesPerLayer - The number of nodes in each layer. Note, an illegal argument exception is thrown if the number of nodes in the last layer does not equal outputDim.

    • getIndex

      public int getIndex(Indices ind)
      Finds the index in the vector that describes a neural networks weights and biases.
      Parameters:
      ind - An index in layer, row, column notation
      Returns:
      The index in the Rn vector describing a neural network with these dimensions.

    • getWeightIndex

      public int getWeightIndex(int matrix, int row, int col)
      Finds the index in the vector that describes a neural networks weights and biases.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The index of the matrix in dims.
      row - The index of the desired row.
      col - The index of the desired column. This should be -1 for a bias.
      Returns:
      The index in the Rn vector describing a neural network with these dimensions.

    • getBiasIndex

      public int getBiasIndex(int layer, int row)
      Gets the neural network vector's index for the proffered bias.
      Parameters:
      layer - The layer of the desired bias.
      row - the row of the desired bias.
      Returns:
      The index in the vector that describes the nueral network.

    • getIndex

      public Indices getIndex(int ind)
      Gets the indices of a neural-network description-vector value.
      Parameters:
      ind - The index in the neural-network description vector
      Returns:
      The indices of the value held in the neural-network description vector.

    • isIndex

      public boolean isIndex(Indices ind)
      Checks if the proffered index actually exists.
      Parameters:
      ind - An index whose validity needs to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if the index might be valid, false if it is definitely not.

    • numVariables

      public int numVariables()
      The total number of variables, or alternatively, the total number of weight and biases, the length of the vector that uniquely describes a neural network with these layer dims.
      Returns:

    • mostNodesInALayer

      public int mostNodesInALayer()
      Finds the layer with the most nodes and returns the number of nodes in that layer. This method has linear time as a function of the number of layers.
      Returns:
      The number of nodes in the layer with the most nodes.
